data.text: @lenmac1 @NickRivaaah @iamthejayc @CBCNS It’s working much better in Atlantic Canada than in the rest of the country. Average of 62% want the restrictions lifted. Only 31% in Atlantic Canada. I wonder where the testing scores are the lowest…?
@CBCNS Now lift the rest a vow to never bring them back.
@CBCNS Another terrible day for Nova Scotians drying from covid thanks to the Tories
@CBCNS Through shameful leadership, the #eugenics phase of the pandemic begins.
@CBCNS 7 more vaccine deaths with thousands more to happen. Vaccine genocide we now call it.

@CBCNS The two things have nothing to do with each other. Very unprofessional, fear mongering title. This is why people are STILL suffering from anxiety and panic over “covid”. The media is the disease. Shame on you CBC
@CBCNS Wow my Covid dichotomy disconnect continues
@iamthejayc @CBCNS shhh they are trying to spin a narrative to the feeble minded.
